text.author: Nancy Pelosi
text.summary: In this speech, Nancy Pelosi advocates in favor of the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act, stating that this isn't a way for her to disminish the work of law enforcement, while also expressing sympathy towards George Floyd's family.
text.title: Pelosi Floor Speech in Support of the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act
